seo.meta_description_en: The ALBI (Albumin-Bilirubin) Grade for Hepatocellular Carcinoma (HCC) predicts survival in HCC patients.
seo.keywords_en: Albumin, bilirubin, liver function, liver dysfunction, HCC survival, C-P grade, Child-Pugh grade

how_to_use.use_case_en: Do you use the ALBI Grade for HCC and want to contribute your expertise? Join our contributor team!

next_steps.advice_en: Do you use the ALBI Grade for HCC and want to contribute your expertise? Join our contributor team!

about.formula_en: ALBI = (log10 bilirubin × 0.66) + (albumin × -0.085), where bilirubin is in μmol/L and albumin in g/L.

creator_info.about_en: Philip J. Johnson, MD, FRCP, is a professor in translational oncology at the University of Liverpool. He is also the deputy director of the North West Cancer Research Centre, University of Liverpool. Dr. Johnson’s primary research is focused on diagnosis and prognosis of hepatobiliary and pancreatic cancer.
